headline: Winter Intersession Hours
paragraph: Keep warm and enjoy the winter break! Check our hours page for opening times during the intersession.

headline: Featured Resource: Swank Steaming Video
paragraph: The Library's subscription to Swank Digital Campus offers streaming of feature films and documentaries produced by major Hollywood and independent studios.

headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.

headline: Featured Resource: Safari
paragraph: Access thousands of ebooks, videos, and courses in tech, business, communications, design, management, and more with Safari Books Online.

headline: Vandal Poem of the Day enters Fifth Year
paragraph: In its five years, VPoD has published over 650 poems from more than 200 poets. This year the site features poems from Canarium Books.
